sources.title: Fury of the Shaolin Master
sources.description: Title: Fury of the Shaolin Master Summary: A government law officer is dispatched to bring his brother's killers to justice. On his bloody mission, untold assassins are thrown at him, but to no avail. One by one they are done away with in a most militant style. Directed by: Fu-Ti Lin Actors: Production Company: Hong Kong Alpha Motion Pictures Co. Release Date: 10 March 1978 (Taiwan) Aspect Ratio: 2.35 : 1 A government law officer is dispatched to bring his brother's killers to justice. On his bloody mission, untold assassins are thrown at him, but to no avail. One by one they are done away with in a most militant style.

metadata.Plot: A government law officer is dispatched to bring his brother's killers to justice. On his bloody mission, untold assassins are thrown at him, but to no avail. One by one they are done away with in a most militant style.
metadata.Actors: Yueh Hua, Yin-Tze Pan, Sing Chen
